DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Lipid-lowing Tea effective safe treatment Hyperlipidemia Patients
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Evaluation Efficacy Lipid-Lowing Tea Hyperlipidemia Patients ’ Lipid Profiles
DOC.criteria: Patient age 2065 year ; either sex Patient diagnose hyperlipidemia ( fasting level TC > =200mg/dL ) , TG > =200mg/dL < 400mg/dL , LDLC > =130mg/dL ) Patient sign informed consent form Patient pregnancy ( child bear potential ) , lactation Patient lipid regulate agent within 4 week prior study period Patient currently take concomitant medication , oral contraceptive , medical treatment capable interfere lipid metabolism ( eg thiazide , βblockers , cyclosporins , itraconazole erythromycin , danazol ) Patient medical history hypothyroidism , pancreatitis , cholestasis , nephrotic syndrome , gall bladder disease , primary biliary cirrhosis . Patient liver dysfunction ( SGOT SGPT > 2x ULN ) Patient renal insufficiency ( serum creatinine > 1.3mg/dL ) Patient myocardial infarction , cerebrovascular disease , major operation within 6 month prior study period .
